meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Nick Lasik Sara Tess Neumann Campbell Warner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6878.

td.p: Nick Lasik, a bartender from Portland, Oregon
Sara Tess Neumann, a museum educator from Quincy, Massachusetts
Campbell Warner, a military attorney originally from Rock Hill, South Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,000)

tr.td: SPOT THE MAMMAL
11-LETTER WORDS
ARRESTED DEVELOPMENT
MEASURING DEVICES
POP CULTURE COLLEGE COURSES
"AMEN"
